original_text: The Levites and the other Israelites will bring their gifts of grain, wine and olive oil to store in the temple's rooms. The priests will store them with the things that they use to serve God in the temple. That is the place where the priests who are working at that time, the temple guards and the singers stay. We agree that we will always take care of the temple of our God.’ The Levites and the other Israelites will bring their gifts of grain, wine and olive oil to store in the temple's rooms. The priests will store them with the things that they use to serve God in the temple. That is the place where the priests who are working at that time, the temple guards and the singers stay.
korean_text: 곧 이스라엘 자손과 레위 자손이 거제로 드린 곡식과 새 포도주와 기름을 가져다가 성소의 그릇들을 두는 골방 곧 섬기는 제사장들과 문지기들과 노래하는 자들이 있는 골방에 둘 것이라 그리하여 우리가 우리 하나님의 전을 버려 두지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: The Levites and the other Israelites
will bring their gifts of grain, wine and olive oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 곡식, 포도주, 올리브유 예물을 가져올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to store in the temple's rooms
The priests will store them
with the things that they use to serve God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님을 섬기는 데 사용하는 것들과 함께

sentences.original_text: in the temple
That is the place
where the priests who are working at that time
the temple guards and the singers stay
sentences.korean_translation: 성전 경비병과 노래하는 사람들이 머무는 곳

sentences.original_text: We agree that we will always take care
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 항상 돌볼 것이라는 데 동의합니다

sentences.original_text: of the temple of our God
The Levites and the other Israelites will bring their gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 레위인과 다른 이스라엘 사람들은 그들의 예물을 가져올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: of grain, wine and olive oil
to store in the temple's rooms
The priests will store them
with the things that they use to serve God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님을 섬기는 데 사용하는 것들과 함께

sentences.original_text: in the temple
That is the place
where the priests who are working at that time
the temple guards and the singers stay
sentences.korean_translation: 성전 경비병과 노래하는 사람들이 머무는 곳
